name: Azi Dahaka
description: Azi Dahaka is a large, three-headed dragon with scales that reflect its chaotic nature. It possesses powerful jaws and claws capable of delivering devastating attacks. Its appearance is imposing, embodying raw power and menace.
memorable: Its three-headed form and ability to control weather, along with devastating storm breath attacks, make Azi Dahaka a unique and fearsome foe.
goals: Azi Dahaka typically seeks to dominate its territory and instill fear in other creatures as a powerful predator.
relations: Azi Dahaka might be encountered with other dragons or as a master to lesser chaotic creatures, embodying evil and chaos.
environment: Normally found in desolate areas or mountainous regions, where it can exert its dominance.
strengths: High durability with substantial hit points, resistance to non-magical damage, and formidable multiattack capabilities.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks, presenting a tactical challenge for foes skilled in magic.
attacks: Its attacks include three powerful bite attacks and two claw attacks per turn, dealing significant piercing and slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Storm Breath, a devastating area attack that deals bludgeoning and lightning damage, pushes opponents away, and can extinguish flames.
senses: Azi Dahaka has blindsight extending 60 feet and a passive perception of 21, making it highly aware of its surroundings.
skills: Azi Dahaka is proficient in Perception and Stealth, allowing it to effectively scout and ambush enemies.
additional_information: Has Legendary Resistance, allowing it to succeed inherently on failed saves.
Magic Resistance grants it advantage on saving throws against spells.
Reactive Heads allows for additional reactions during combat.
Vermin Blood ability inflicts damage on melee attackers.
Capable of altering weather conditions and effectively controlling the battlefield.
spellcasting: Can cast spells such as Control Weather and Call Lightning using legendary actions.
